name: Grilled Mexican Asparagus, Pepper and Potato Salad
description: A Mexican-inspired vegetable side dish perfect any night of the week.

ingredients.name: asparagus
ingredients.additionalInstruction: trimmed and cut into small spears

preparation: Fill frying pan with water and bring to a boil.
Add potatoes and boil for 5 minutes, then add asparagus. Pan will be full. Bring back to a boil, then carefully drain.
Place potatoes, asparagus and peppers in a large bowl. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with Fajita Seasoning and Vegetable Seasoning. Toss to coat.
Turn into rectangular mesh grilling pan. Place on barbecue and grill for 3â€“5 minutes, shaking pan often, until vegetables are lightly charred.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Vegetable Seasoning
summary: All-in-one herby meal helper. Less measuring & more flavor!
